name: Project Tinman
description:
To move: WASD or arrow keys
Jump: Spacebar/up arrow/W
Fire cork gun: left mouse button
Aim cork gun: point cursor to the opposite direction of where you want to be launched
Pause: Escape
Premise: You are a toy, trying to escape the room of a controlling child and their mindless other toys. If you enter the vision of another toy, the human will arrive and begin looking for you. If you enter the child's vision, it's Game Over. Your goal is to arrive at the window to your freedom.
